definition: A person who has recently joined the military or a similar organization, typically used to refer to someone in the early stages of training or service.

examples.german: Der Rekrut absolviert gerade seine Grundausbildung.
examples.english: The recruit is currently undergoing basic training.

examples.german: Der Rekrut wurde gestern in die Armee aufgenommen.
examples.english: The recruit was admitted to the army yesterday.

examples.german: Der Rekrut hat sich freiwillig gemeldet.

examples.english: The recruit is wearing a uniform.

examples.german: Der Rekrut wird in einer Kaserne untergebracht.
examples.english: The recruit will be accommodated in a barracks.
